subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Ghost Box Demo at Moundsville WV
author: SnowfireL@aol.com
full_text:
-------------------------------1243457834
Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

All the more reason for them to move on so, they can make up for the crimes 
 they've done on the other side, we are all held accountable, and must make 
up  for things, but them just sitting there does no good, they are just 
there so the  people owning the jail can make money for themselves.  If I had 
to money to  go, I would, and I would do whatever I could in secret if need 
be, to send them  back to God.  We all come from God, and we all must return 
to Him, or if  some prefer, we all come from the Universe, and we all go 
back to the Universe  that's the modern day name for the title God.  I guess 
The Man upstairs can  be whatever He wants to be, eh?  Steve you have been 
given a gift, to have  heard their plea's for help, many probably can't hear 
them, but you did, do  whatever you can to help them, and great will be your 
reward when you cross  over.  Do you think one or two of them may have 
followed you outside the  walls?  Maybe, you should ask if they did, 
 
 
In a message dated 5/27/2009 4:46:50 P.M. Eastern Daylight Time,  
foreverhaunted57@... writes:

Those that were executed there by the noose or electric chair were  rapists 
and murders. Many that were not on death row died by the  hands of fellow 
inmates. The energy in this place was incredible. I  couldn't sleep for two 
days after experiencing it for six hours.
Steve
